title: Nextbit Robin Review - The First Cloud Phone
description: The Nextbit Robin is the world's first cloud-oriented phone. A comprehensive review covering build quality, internal hardware, screen, camera tests and performance.  Are cloud phones worth it? How is this different from Google Drive or Drop box? Who is the Robin for? Is the Nextbit cloud useful? Watch this video to find out! =)  Be sure to check out my other phone reviews: 950 + 950XL -  Nexus 5X + 6P -  iPhone 6s -  Moto X Pure -  OnePlus 2 -    Music Credits:  Intro: Robotaki - Raton Laveur Background: FILI - The Day Dream  If you want to support the channel, consider a Dave2D membership by clicking the Join button above!      Purchases made from store links may give me some money.  (It doesnt cost you extra, so please buy everything)
